name: PlayHT, Inc.
description: Developer of an audio platform designed to create realistic voiceovers from text instantly in multiple languages. The company's platform offers various features such as a text-to-voice editor, audio widgets, podcasts, audio articles and phonetics, enabling media companies to scale and automate their content creation with realistic and fidelity generative voices.
one_liner: Developer of an audio platform designed to create realistic voiceovers from text instantly in multiple languages. The company's platform offers various features such as a text-to-voice editor, audio widgets, podcasts, audio articles and phonetics, enabling media companies to scale and automate their content creation with realistic and fidelity generative voices.
